name: Seedvolution
description:
In a post-apocalyptic world, a tiny mutant seed grows. Adapt to your available resources, mutate and evolve to become the ultimate plant – grow pores, tentacles and who knows what else! An intuitive resource management game where every player has a different experience.... and different looking plant!

Attribution: special thanks to Hyptosis and Zabin for use of their assets posted on opengameart.org, Lorc and Delapouite for use of their assets on game-icons.net and Siddharth Mehra for use of his song Mera Dil Hai Hindustani (Original Mix).
